Browse Professional Exams and Preparatory Courses
Develop industry-ready competencies and earn specialist certificates that stack towards a degree or a higher qualification.
Earn micro-credentials that lead to a degree or a higher qualification
Are you ready to take your professional journey to new heights? Discover our micro-credentials offered via the innovative Competency-based Stackable Micro-credential (CSM) Pathway.

Designed with the industry's most sought-after competencies in mind, these micro-credentials empower learners like you to excel in new or higher-level job roles with unmatched confidence and competence.
Each micro-credential can be taken individually to earn a specialist certificate, or can be stacked toward an SIT degree.

Each micro-credential is strategically designed to equip you with the essential skills and knowledge necessary to thrive in new or higher-level job roles. Earn specialist certificates that demonstrate mastery of competencies highly sought after by today's leading organisations.

Choose micro-credentials that match your current professional development needs – and enjoy up to 90% SkillsFuture funding while doing so. Seize the opportunity to stack the micro-credentials towards an SIT degree or a higher qualification, while managing multiple commitments.

Embark on a holistic learning journey through our blended, authentic learning model that seamlessly integrates online and in-person delivery. Supported by dedicated success coaches, you will receive personalised guidance to navigate online materials at your own pace.

"Knowing that my lifelong learning journey is a shared endeavour made possible through the unwavering belief and support of individuals who recognised my potential, as well as NCS that is investing in my professional and personal growth, is truly heartening. I am grateful for this opportunity to be part of the CSM Pathway, and looking ahead, I am excited to continue growing in my career."
Analyst, NCS and current CSM Degree Pathway (Applied Computing) learner

Earn Specialist Certificates to broaden your career prospects in IT. Stack them towards a degree in Applied Computing with our unique Competency-based Stackable Micro-credential (CSM) Pathway designed for working professionals.
BSc (Hons) in Applied Computing (via the CSM Pathway)

AI and Machine Learning, Data Science and Analytics, Computer Architecture, Computer Ethics and Privacy, Programming and Software Development, Networking and Security, User Experience Design, Cloud Computing, Competency-based Education

Earn Specialist Certificates to broaden your career prospects in Electrical and Electronic Engineering. Stack them towards a degree in (EE) Engineering with our unique Competency-based Stackable Micro-credential (CSM) Pathway designed for working professionals.
BEng (Hons) in Electrical and Electronic Engineering (via the CSM Pathway)
Electrical Engineering, Electronics Engineering, Power and Clean Energy, Sustainability, Data Science and Analytics, Robotics and Automation, Advanced Manufacturing, Competency-based Education

Earn Specialist Certificates to broaden your career prospects in Infrastructure and Systems Engineering. Stack them towards a degree in (IS) Engineering with our unique Competency-based Stackable Micro-credential (CSM) Pathway designed for working professionals.
BEng (Hons) in Infrastructure and Systems Engineering (via the CSM Pathway)
Mechanical Engineering, Systems Engineering, Robotics and Automation, Transport Engineering, Advanced Manufacturing, Competency-based Education
